256921.「では 大魔王を裏切り\n 我らに 味方するというのか？\n にわかには 信じら:
So you betray the Great Demon King and side
with us? I find that hard to believe...

256922.「あんな どこの馬の骨とも知れない若造に\n 大魔王の座をくれてやるなんて 冗談:
It's no joke to give the title of Great Demon King to such a young man who has no idea where he came from. I'm not going to wag my tail to
him.

256923.「アンタたちにとっても 悪い話じゃないだろ？\n 目ざわりな大魔王を 俺たちの手:
It's not a bad idea for you, is it? Let's make
that annoying Great Demon King disappear with
our own hands, shall we?

256925.「誰か 助けて……。\n ここから 出して……。: Somebody help me... get me out of here...

256927.「キミは……？\n 優しくて あたたかな光を感じる……。: Are you...? I feel a gentle, warm light...

256930.「目が覚めたら 知らないところにいて……\n あの恐ろしい連中につかまって ここ:
I woke up in a strange place... and those
horrible people grabbed me and put me here...

256931.「自分の名前以外 何も 思いだせない……。\n 僕は いったい……？:
I can't remember anything but my own name...
what am I...?

256932.「あーぁ。やっと終わったぜ。 \n すっかり 待たせちまったみたいだな。:
Ahhh. It's finally over. Looks like I made you
guys wait a long time.

256933.「そいつが ヤツらの言う いけにえの人間か。\n 戦勝祈願に いけにえを捧げる儀:
That's the sacrificial human they're talking about. They have a ceremony to offer sacrifices to pray for victory. How old-
fashioned...

256934.「……なんか 話してたみたいだったが\n アンタの 知り合いかい？: I heard you guys talking about something.

256935.「……なるほどねぇ。\n アストルティアから 迷いこんだのかもな。\n たまーに:
I see. Maybe they wandered in from Astoltia.
There are people like that once in a while.
There are idiots like that.

256937.「おっと 今はコイツのことはいい。\n 本題に入ろう。:
Oops, let's not talk about this guy right now.
Let's get down to business.

256938.「ヤツら まんまと引っかかってくれたぜ。\n 天下のバルディスタ軍と 俺様の智謀:
They got it all figured out. Valdista's army
and my wits and brains are all over the place,
and we're as happy as if we'd won.

256939.「大魔王城を攻める前に 決起集会を\n 開くらしくてな。反乱の首謀者を始め\n:
They're going to hold a rally before they attack Great Demon King's castle. The ringleaders of the rebellion and other key
figures in the organization will show up.

256940.「そこを 協力者と見せかけた バルディスタ兵が\n 一気にたたく！ アンタも 大:
Valdista Soldiers, pretending to be collaborators, smashed him at once! You, as the Great Demon King, can go wild as much as
you like.

256941.「……残念だが コイツは このままだ。\n しばらく いけにえのまま いてもらう:
I'm sorry, but he's going to stay as he is.
He'll remain a sacrificial animal for a while.

256942.「戦勝祈願の儀式とやらが 終わる前までに\n 助けてやれば 文句ないだろ？\n:
If we can get him out of there before the victory rituals are over, I'm sure you won't have any complaints. We can't cause trouble
now.

256943.「決起集会は ジャリムバハ砂漠の\n 北西にある 砂塵の遺跡で開かれるらしい。\:
The rally is supposed to be held at Dust
Ruins, northwest of Jyarimbaha Desert. Let's
head there.

256944.「ここから先は 何が起きるか わからねえ。\n しっかり 準備しとけよ？\n く:
You never know what might happen from here on
out. So be prepared, okay? You won't regret
it...

256947.「魔界解放軍の 同志たちよ！\n 我らは 同じ旗のもとに……:
Comrades of the Liberation Army of Demon
World! Under the same banner...

256948.「うおおおおおおおッ！\n 大魔王を ブッ殺せぇぇーーッ！:
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! Kill the Great Demon
King!

256950.「……うるさァーーーいッ！\n 人の話は 最後まで静かに 聞かんかッ！！:
Shut up! Will you listen quietly to the end of
what I have to say!

256952.「魔界解放軍の 同志たちよ！\n 我らは 同じ旗のもとに集った！\n 大魔王を討:
Comrades of the Army of Demon World Liberation! We are gathered under the same banner! For the purpose of defeating the Great
Demon King!

256953.「バルディスタの参謀 ベルトロどのも\n 我が軍の志に賛同くださり ご加盟いただ:
Valdista's chief of staff, Mr. Bertolo, has
agreed to join our army! With their help, we
will be victorious!

256954.「我らは 大魔王を倒し 魔界を解放する！\n どこの馬の骨かも わからんヤツに\:
We will defeat the Great Demon King and liberate Demon World! We will not leave Demon World in the hands of a man who has no idea
where he comes from!

256955.「大魔王の座は 真に魔界を憂う者…… \n このゴッツェにこそ ふさわしい！\n:
The position of Great Demon King belongs to the one who truly cares about Demon World, Gotze! I will lead Demon World to a better
future!

256956.「さぁ！ 我らの勝利を祈願して\n いけにえを 捧げるのだ！:
Come on! Let us offer up our sacrifices in
prayer for our victory!

256958.「どういうことも 何も\n テメーらが 間抜けだってだけさ。:
What does that mean? It just means you're
stupid.

256959.「我らバルディスタが 仕えるのは\n 魔王ヴァレリアと こちらにいらっしゃる\n:
We Valdistas serve only the Demon Queen
Valeria and the Great Demon King over here.

256960.「テメーらに振る しっぽなんて\n 最っ初から 持ち合わせちゃいねェんだよ。\n:
I don't have a tail to wag for you guys from
the very beginning. You idiot.

256962.「……これが 俗にいう 絶体絶命というやつか。\n だが まだ 負けたわけではな:
...This is what is commonly referred to as a
desperate situation. But we haven't lost yet!
If we defeat you here, victory will be ours!

256965.「見ろ！ この姿を！\n 俺こそが！ 真の大魔王だァァァ！！:
Look at me! Look at me! I am the one! The true
Great Demon King!

256967.「魔瘴をあびて ピンピンしてやがる……！\n あのガキ いったい何者なんだ？:
He's still alive and well after all that demon
miasma...! Who the hell is that kid?

256968.「おっと こうしちゃいられねえ。\n ここから先は アンタの仕事だ。:
Oh, man, I can't do this. You're in charge
from here on out.

256969.「見りゃわかるだろ？\n あんな おっかないの 俺には荷が重すぎる。\n アンタ:
You can see that, can't you? I'm too much of a
burden for such an ominous thing. Let's see
how you do.

256970.「偉大なる 大魔王様！\n 愚かなる反逆者に 制裁を！:
Great Demon King! I bring down the traitor to
the earth!

256971.「……せっかく あの道化師から\n 特別製の魔瘴石を もらったのに。\n くぅぅ:
I went to the trouble of getting a special
Miasmite from that clown. Ughhhh...!

256972.「………で？\n 一応 謀反の理由を 聞かせてもらおうか？:
So...so? Shall we hear the reason for the
insurrection, just in case?

256973.「理由だと！？ 理由なんて ソイツが\n 大魔王になったからに 決まってるじゃな:
Reason? Of course it's because he became the
Great Demon King!

256974.「ヴァレリアとかアスバルとか 大魔王になるなら\n そういう大物だと 思ってた。:
I thought it would be Valeria or Asbal or something like that if I was going to be a Great Demon King. I didn't go to the Demongate
because I thought I couldn't do it anyway.

256975.「それなのに フタを開けてみたら！\n コイツみたいな ぽっと出の地味なヤツが\:
And yet, when I opened the lid! A simple, out-
of-the-box guy like him is the Great Demon
King!

256976.「コイツが なれるなら \n 誰が大魔王になったって いいじゃん！\n 俺がなっ:
If he can become the Great Demon King, then
who cares who becomes the Great Demon King! I
don't care if it's me!

256977.「俺だって！ 大魔王に！\n なりたかったんだよぉぉぉぉーーーーーッ！！:
Me too! Great Demon King! I wanted to be a
great demon king!

256978.「……だが 戦ってみて わかった。\n コイツは ただの 地味顔じゃない。\n:
But when I fought him, I realized. This is not
just a plain face. ...This is the true Great
Demon King.

256979.「わかってんじゃねーか。: You know what I'm talking about.

256980.「じゃ 大魔王様！\n コイツら ひと思いに やっちゃってください！:
Great Demon King! Let's take them all out at
once!

256981.「ひえええ……命だけは 勘弁してください！\n 俺たち 心を入れ替えます！\n:
Please don't kill me! We'll change our minds!
We'll change our minds! We pledge our
allegiance to you! You're right!

256982.ゴッツェたちを 許しますか？<yesno><close>:
Do you forgive Gotze and the others?
<yesno><close>

256983.「うわぁーーん！ そんなこと 言わないで！\n なんでもしますから！ この通り！:
Oh, my God! Don't say that! I'll do
anything! Just like this! <yesno><close>

256984.「大魔王……いや 大魔王様！\n 敵であった俺たちに 情けをかけるなんて\n な:
Great Demon King...no, Great Demon King! How
dare you show mercy to us, your enemies!

256985.「あなたは 俺たちの 恩人です！\n 一生 あなたに ついていきます！:
You are our benefactor! We will follow you for
the rest of our lives!

256986.「大魔王様 バンザイ！\n 偉大なる その名に 栄光あれ！:
Great Demon King, hooray! Glory to your great
name!

256987.「……ここだけの話。ちょっとだけ\n 部下といっしょに 反乱軍に\n 寝返っちま:
Between you and me. I was thinking of turning
over to the rebels with my men for a bit.

256988.「だが 今日の働きっぷりを見て\n 寝返らなくて正解だったと 確信したね。\n:
But after seeing how hard you worked today, I'm convinced you were right not to turn. You will be a moderately competent Great Demon
King.

256989.「さーて……問題はコイツだな。\n えっと ナラジアとか いったっけか？:
Well... the problem is this guy. Narasia, or
was it something like that?

256990.「お前 本当に 何者なんだ？\n あれだけの魔瘴を浴びて 平気でいられるなんて\:
Who are you really? I can't believe you're a
mere human being who can be exposed to that
much demon miasma and remain unaffected...

256991.「……本当に 僕は 何も覚えていないんだ。\n でも あの不気味な霧を見て\n:
I really don't remember anything. But that
eerie fog reminded me of one thing...

256992.「ここに来る前 深い霧の中に 僕らはいた。\n 僕は ひとりでは なかったんだ…:
Before we came here, we were in a deep fog. I
was not alone.

256993.「僕に そっくりな女の子……\n あの子がいたから 僕は…………。:
I had a girl who looked just like me... and
she was the reason I...

256994.「そういや コイツ よく見ると\n 魔瘴の巫女に そっくりだよな。\n ……たし:
Well, if you look closely, this guy looks just
like the maiden of miasma. I think her name is
Irusha, right?

256996.「まあ ここで 考えてもしかたないか。\n どう見ても 害はなさそうだしな。:
Well, there's nothing to think about here. It
seems harmless enough.

256997.「大魔王様は 当分 忙しいんだろ？\n とりあえず バルディスタで預かっとくわ。:
Great Demon King is busy for the time being,
right? I'll keep him at Valdista for now.

256998.「よーし！ ナラジアくーん。\n オジサンと いっしょに来てもらおうか……:
Yo! Mr. Narasia. I'm gonna need you to come
with me and my old man...

257000.「アイツ どこ行きやがった！: Where the fuck did he go?

257001.「ちくしょーッ！ あのガキ！\n ただでさえ 忙しいってのに\n 面倒事 増やし:
Damn it! That kid! He's just adding to the
hassle of my busy life!

257002.「……このまま ほっといて\n 死なれても 寝覚めがわりぃ。\n アイツのことは:
I don't want to wake up and leave him to die
like this. I'll have my men look for him.

257003.「ほれ！ アンタは とっとと\n ヴァレリアに 報告に行けよ。\n あんまり待た:
Come on! You should go report to Valeria right
away. You'll get hurt if you keep her waiting
too long.
